EmailTemplate.name: Special Case Approval IAAO
EmailTemplate.subject: Special Case Approval IAAO
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
This is a request for approval from the International and Academic Affairs Office to work with {!Agreement__c.Agreement_Partner__c} on a CRADA project titled {!Agreement__c.Agreement_Title__c}. Please respond to this email with an approval or any objections that IAAO may have regarding this Collaborator. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact {!Agreement__c.Agreement_Officer__c}.
Thank you.
